fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints

Class POJOEndPoint<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPoint<I>
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.POJOEndPoint<I>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractEndPointI, EndPointI<I>

    public class POJOEndPoint<I>
extends EndPoint<I>
    The class POJOEndPointDescriptor defines a plain old Java object (POJO) reference as a end point.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Created on : 2024-06-25

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      protected I reference
      direct reference to the POJO.
